Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Peptide BmKb1 (Non-disulfide-bridged peptide 4.2, NDBP-4.2; Arthropods, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=16 µg/ml), Micrococcus luteus(MIC=81.5 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=48.8 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=18.1 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=90.8 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Binding Target: Cell membrane (Forms a helical membrane channel in the prey)
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria.

Literature.Title: Identification and functional characterization of novel scorpion venom peptides with no disulfide bridge from Buthus martensii Karsch.
Literature.Author: Zeng XC, Wang SX, Zhu Y, Zhu SY, Li WX.

Literature.Title: Genomic organization of four novel nondisulfide-bridged peptides from scorpion Mesobuthus martensii Karsch gaining insight into evolutionary mechanism.
Literature.Author: Luo F, Zeng XC, Hahin R, Cao ZJ, Liu H, Li WX.

Literature.Title: Genomic organization of four novel nondisulfide-bridged peptides from scorpion Mesobuthus martensii Karsch: gaining insight into evolutionary mechanism.
Literature.Author: Liu H.,Cao Z.-J.,Hahin R.,Zeng X.-C.,Luo F.
